read_and_manipulate_file <- function(file_path, user_input) {
  fileExtension <- tools::file_ext(file_path)
  
  switch(fileExtension,
         "csv" = {fileContent <- read.csv(file_path)},
         "xlsx" = {fileContent <- readxl::read_excel(file_path)},
         "sql" = {fileContent <- readLines(file_path)},
         "xml" = {fileContent <- xml2::read_xml(file_path)},
         "txt" = {fileContent <- readLines(file_path)},
         {fileContent <- NULL}
  )
  
  manipulatedFileContent <- manipulate_file_content(fileContent, user_input)
  
  return(manipulatedFileContent)
}

manipulate_file_content <- function(fileContent, user_input) {
  manipulatedFileContent <- fileContent # Add your manipulation logic here
  
  return(manipulatedFileContent)
}

save_file <- function(fileContent, file_path) {
  write.csv(fileContent, file_path)
}
